name: It's Jinzo! (Skill Card)
text:
Espa Roba / Skill
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
"Jinzo" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's Skill Cards.
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control "Jinzo", you can look at 1 face-down card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zones, and if it is a Trap, draw 1 card.
